# init()

**Initializer**

Initializes a download task.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Discussion

Don’t use this initalizer to manually create download tasks. Instead, use the factory methods on [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSession] to add tasks to an existing URL session.

## Creating download tasks

- **new()**: Creates and initializes a download task.
